overview: A sales executive that has overseen the sales of sponsorships and advertising in both the public and private sector working with the Oregon State Fair, the Portland Rose Festival and Oregon Travel magazine, developing relationships with over 20 new sponsors for the Rose Festival that brought in a half million dollars extra. Sponsoring companies include Comcast, Geiko, Pepsi, Coke, Miller Brewing, Bally Total Fitness, and Chevrolet.
